texts.es: Rosa es una madre de familia de 33 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura. Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería y artesanía. Rosa desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas) y porcino (cerdos), su corrales se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada, pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para qué pueda ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su familia. También cuenta con una hectárea de terreno que ha recibido como herencia de su padre para que la trabaje, siembra limón y una vez que cosecha lo vende en los mercados de la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados y fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras y su producto, con los ingresos que obtenga pueda cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Rosa es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia se supere y mejore económicamente.
texts.en: Rosa is a 33-year-old mother who lives with her husband and children in their own home, which does not receive basic services, in a rural area of Tambogrande district, department of Piura. This area is noted for farming, livestock and handicrafts. Rosa has been raising and selling sheep and pigs for some years. Her animal pens are located outside her home and are suitable and spacious. She gives her animals balanced feed and natural pastures so they reach an optimum level of development, and she then sells them in the different markets in her area, making good profits that enable her to cover her family's daily expenses. Rosa also owns a hectare of land that her father left as an inheritance. She grows lemons which, once harvested, she sells in the markets in her area. Rosa has requested a loan from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed and fertilizers to improve her land and crops. She will use the income she makes to repay her loan and improve her family's quality of life. Rosa is a hard-working person and very responsible. The only thing she wants is for her family to do well and improve their financial situation.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed and fertilizers.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 47 years old and has been in farming for seven years, which is her sole source of income for her family's upkeep. Her farm produces maize, beans and vegetables. She is married with eight children whose ages range between 23 and 12 years old.

Agnes has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry birds for a new farming venture. She hopes to grow her poultry business and start a wholesale business for poultry farming.

Agnes says rampant diseases and drought are the outright challenges in the farming business but appreciates Juhudi Kilimo's loan services.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 72 years old and married with nine adult children. The last two children are still schooling. He has been in farming for 30 years and produces milk, tea, maize and eggs, which he sells to the local market. His farm is managed with the help of one farmhand.

Joseph has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy more poultry birds. He says the farming income will help him to educate his last two children. He also hopes to increase the number of birds as time go by to enjoy the economies of scale.

He is, however, worried about the high costs of feed for both his poultry and dairy animals. He mentions Juhudi Kilimo loans as a good empowerment to smallholder farmers.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds

loans.name: Believe In God Group

texts.en:
Mariatu is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Mariatu was born in Kamakwe, a town in Northern Sierra Leone. She is thirty years of age. Mariatu is married to a teacher and the couple has 4 children – 3 in primary school and 1 in secondary school. Mariatu sells cloths.

With the help of this loan, she and her group members will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales and, consequently, improve on their living conditions. Mariatu will use her share of the loan (SLL 1,400,000) to buy bales of “wax cotton cloths” for retailing.

loans.use: to buy bales of “wax cotton cloths” for retailing.

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en:
Joshua is a farmer in Kitale area of Western Kenya. He is married and has six adult children, the last born still attending post secondary education. He has been in farming for thirty years and currently employs one farmhand. He produces milk, eggs, beans, sorghum and millet for the local market.

Joshua has made a loan request amounting to 50,000 KES with Juhudi Kilimo to boost his poultry business. He says he will buy more poultry birds at 20,000 KES and build a bigger housing unit for the increased number of birds. He says he will use the income to repay the loan and see his last born child through school.

He is pleased with Juhudi Kilimo loan services and adds it has help smallholder farmers access the much needed financial support.

loans.use: to buy poultry birds and expand poultry housing unit.

loans.name: Samah

texts.en:
Samah is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Ma'moon appears in her Kiva profile, photographed in front of his store. Samah is a 31 year old young woman, she is a mother with four sons and one daughter. 

For the past five years, Samah's husband has been selling recycled iron materials. This has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover the family's needs.

Samah is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing bulk of iron recycled materials to sell. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase bulk supplies of iron recycled materials for sale.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 33 years old and she is married to James. Together they have four children. He is a farmer and has been in the business for the past five years.

This is Lucy's first term loan with KADET LTD. She was brought to KADET LTD by our client. She will use the loan amount to purchase a dairy cow and farm inputs. She hopes to be a leading dairy cattle farmer.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow and farm inputs.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is 32 years old and married. He has 2 children. 

Fredrick has been in the business for 6 years and has employed 4 people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income. He hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy vehicles spare parts to sell.

loans.use: to buy vehicle spare parts to sell.

loans.name: John Munga

texts.en:
John is still doing farming and the business is doing well. He paid the previous loan on time and he has applied for his third second loan from KADET LTD  to buy seeds and fertilizer for the farm

He hopes to become the top farmer in the Kitiri area.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a father of six children between 18 and 3 years old. He has been in the farming business for 10 years besides running both a motorcycle business and a retail shop business. His farm currently produces bananas, maize, beans and eggs, all of which are sold to the local market.

Joseph has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy more poultry birds and boost his poultry business. He hopes to generate more income from the poultry business and start dairy farming as well. He adds the two business; dairy and poultry, act as good source of supplementary meals for his family.

However, he notes poor market prices and fluctuations as the major challenges.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds

loans.name: Elsa Diner

texts.es: La señora Elsa es soltera, vive en una aldea de Nacaome, Departamento de Valle, ubicado en la zona sur del país, se dedica a la Elaboración y venta de artesanías de barro, siendo en si sus principales clientes las personas que transitan la calle que conduce hacia la frontera de El Amarillo y también clientes que le hacen sus pedidos desde otras ciudades como ser Tegucigalpa y Choluteca. Le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que su negocio le deja ingresos para poder mantenerse. Esta solicitando crédito por cantidad de L. 12,000.00  para la compra de barro, moldes, pinturas, pinceles y reparar el vehículo en el cual transporta su producto.
texts.en: Elsa is single and lives in the town of Nacaome, department of Valle, in southern Honduras. She makes a living making and selling clay handicrafts. Her main customers are drivers heading down the road toward the border, and she also has customers who make orders from other cities like Tegucigalpa and Choluteca. She really likes doing this work because she can take care of herself with the profits. She is requesting the loan to purchase clay, molds, paints and brushes, and to repair the vehicle she uses to transport her products.

loans.use: to purchase clay, brushes, molds, paints and other items.

loans.name: Seriousness Group

texts.en:
Meet with members of the “Seriousness” group from Makeni, a city in Northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of SLL 1,000,000 for each. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Martha is the leader of this group. The 42-year-old is married to a trader and the couple has five children. Martha has been a businesswoman for many years now. She sells a wide variety of items including torchlights, jewelry, body lotions, etc. With her share of this loan, she is going to buy torchlights, cosmetics, etc. in bulk to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy torchlights, cosmetics, etc. in bulk to add to her business.

loans.name: Mareth Cristina

texts.es:
Mareth emprendedora, trabajadora, casada, su esposo le ayuda en los gastos del hogar, de profession respostera desde hace un tiempo trabaja para una empresa de elaboraciones de pasteles, panes y otros productos. Su proyecto es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda y que su familia tenga un mejor futuro. Actualmente su casa es de laminas de zinc y maderas, tambien de alambre de puja como divisiones entre los vecinos, estando su casa en malas condiciones, requieriendo establecer las divisiones entre su casa y la del vecino evitando alguna confusion. 
Esta solicitando el prestamo para invertirlo en la compra de materiales de construcion como: cemento, arena, bloques, hierro, cuartones, estribu entre otros para construir el muro laterial de la vivienda.
Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al mejoramiento de su vivienda ya que obtendra seguridad, proteccion y tranquilidad para su familia.
texts.en: Mareth is enterprising and hard-working.  She is married and her husband helps her with the household expenses.  She is a pastrycook by profession, and has worked for some time at a business that makes cakes, breads and other products.  Her project is to improve the infrastructure of her home so that her family can have a better future.  Their house is now made of sheets of zinc and wood, as well as barbed wire as partitions between neighbours.  Her house is in poor condition, and there is a need to establish the division between her house and that of her neighbour so as to avoid confusion.  She is requesting a loan to invest in purchasing construction materials such as : cement, sand, blocks, iron, beams and supports, among others,  to build a wall lateral to the house.  She is grateful to the finance company for the support in improving her home, because she will obtain security and traquility for her family.

loans.use: buy materials for construction.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, todos trabajan en la familia, ella es ama de casa y su esposo agricultor, de este oficio a logrado vivir, ya que de los cultivos logran vender una parte para comprarse con esos ingresos otros alimentos, ella apoya a su esposo es el cultivo, trabajan en tierras alquiladas.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono, los herbicidas para las plagas, tambien pagara los mozos para que preparen la tierra junto a su esposo, prácticamente ella cubrirá con este préstamo los gastos que origina una siembra, para luego junto a su esposo pagar la deuda.
La aspiración de Teresa es mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia, con este préstamo espera salir bien en sus pagos y poder lograr una buena cosecha.
texts.en:
Teresa lives with her husband and three children. They all work as a family. She is a homemaker while her husband is a farmer, a trade that enables them to earn a living. Part of the crops that they produce are sold so that they can buy other food items. Teresa helps her husband with the planting. They work on rented farmland.

Teresa is currently requesting a loan to buy farming supplies such as compost, herbicides to combat weeds, and to pay young workers for helping her husband prepare the land. Essentially, this loan will cover the costs associated with planting. Later on, she and her husband will be able to pay off their debts. Teresa aspires to improve her family's quality of life. With this loan, she hopes to do well with her payments and achieve a good harvest.

loans.use: to purchase compost and herbicides and to pay workers to prepare the land.

loans.name: Maria Eustaquia

texts.es: La señora Maria tiene 59 años de edad,  es madre de 06 hijos uno de ellos depende de ella, su negocio es la Elaboración y Venta de Rosquillas, su esposo le ayuda en su hogar ya que el se dedica a cultivar el maíz que necesitan, así mismo elabora pan y sale a venderlo en la comunidad desde hace 03 años, en su negocio, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo e hijo, es muy humilde y trabajadora, le gusta salir bien en sus compromisos y le gusta mucho ya que comparte con su familia. Esta solicitando crédito por valor de L. 7,000.00 para invertirlo en la compra de productos para su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria is 59 years old and the mother of six children, one of whom is a dependent. Her business involves making and selling donuts. Her husband helps around the house and grows corn as needed. The corn is used for making bread that is sold in the community. Maria has been in business for three years and her husband and child provide assistance. She is extremely humble and hardworking.

Teresa likes to successfully fulfill her commitments and share with her family. The loan she is requesting in the amount of 7,000 HNL will be invested in the purchase of products for her business.

loans.use: to buy flour, corn, sugar, milk, and eggs.

loans.name: Rosa Medarda

texts.es:
Rosa, se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, tiene 33 años de edad, vive con sus dos hijos que están estudiando, ella tiene la granja desde hace 5 años, aprendió a manejar este negocio con sus padres.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de pollos pequeños y concentrado, tambien medicamentos para tratarlos y evitar enfermedades, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar el negocio, crecer en la granja y mantener lo necesario para el bienestar del negocio.
La aspiración de Rosa es que a través de los préstamos pueda brindarle un mejor cuido a la granja y que sus ingresos sean mejores, ya que podrá mejorar la condición familiar.
texts.en:
Rosa raises chickens for fattening. She is 33 years old and lives with her two children who are in school. Rosa has a poultry farm that has been in operation for five years. She learned how to manage this business from her parents.

Rosa is requesting a loan in order to buy small chickens and concentrated feed. She will also buy medicines for treating and preventing diseases. This purchase will help to improve her business, grow her poultry farm, and maintain what she needs for the well-being of the business.

Rosa hopes that the loans will help her take better care of her farm so that her income will improve. This will provide better conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy small chickens, concentrated feed, and medicines.

loans.name: Hortencia Reina

texts.es:
señora Reina es comerciante, vende perfumes, maquillaje y cremas de diferentes líneas hace más de 8 años,  pero con la marca que le va mejor es con la línea Esika debido a la gran demanda que tiene esta línea. La Sra. Reina es Viuda  y tuvo que salir adelante con 3 hijos, es una madre muy cariñosa y abnegada por lo que siempre se esfuerza para que sus hijos salgan adelante tanto en sus estudios como en sus vidas personales. Lleva los La productos para vender a diferentes lugares, como empresas e Instituciones en las que sus clientes la conocen por que ella además deja sus productos a crédito, la conocen bastante bien pues es una persona cumplida en cuanto a los pedidos se refiere, asimismo ella logra hacer sus ventas para pagar sus facturas a tiempo de modo que le lleguen sus pedidos a tiempo. Tambien trabaja colaborando a su directora de la empresa  de modo que tiene incentivos que son productos de regalo que le llegan por la colaboración que realiza, así es que tiene estos productos también para la venta, con lo cual tiene un ingreso extra.
El destino del crédito es para  capital de operación, con lo cual incrementara los productos que vende y de esa manera podrá tener más utilidades y ofrecer un mejor nivel de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sra. Reina is a merchant who has been selling perfumes, makeup, and crèmes of different brands for more than eight years. However, the brand that sells the best is Esika since there is great demand for those products. Sra. Reina is a widow and has been able to move forward with her three children. She is a very loving and self-sacrificing mother who strives to help her children get ahead in their studies as well as in their personal life. Reina takes her products to different places to sell, including businesses and institutions where her customers know her. In addition, she extends credit for her products. People know her very well for being a pleasant individual whenever they place orders with her. Reina is able to complete her sales so that she can pay her bills on time and ensure that her orders arrive promptly. She also partners with the sales director of her company since they receive incentives in the form of gift products for working together. Reina then sells these products as a way of generating extra income.

This loan will be used as operating capital to increase her inventory of products for sale. As a result, Reina will be able to earn more profit and provide her children a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos niños de 3 y 6 años de edad, administra un taller de estructuras metálicas, este negocio tiene 10 años de existir, fue heredado por su padre, en la actualidad sus ingresos provienen únicamente de este negocio.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de herramientas de trabajo como pulidora, hierro, metal, laminas,  para poder realizar las ventadas, puertas y balcones, con este aporte del préstamo su condición en el negocio será mejor. 
La aspiración de José es mejorar económicamente, con el desarrollo del taller y que su familia cuente con lo necesario.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and two children, ages 3 and 6. He manages a metal shop that has been in existence for 10 years. José inherited this business from his father. At the moment, this business is the only source of income for his family.

He is requesting a loan to buy equipment for his work such as a polisher, iron, metal, and plated sheets so that he can make window frames, doors, and balconies. With the help of this loan, the condition of his business will improve. José aspires to improve financially and develop his workshop so that his family can have what they need.

loans.use: to buy a polisher, iron, metal, and plated sheets.

loans.name: Mónica

texts.es: Con su credikiva anterior Mónica logró mejorar su nivel de ventas porque invirtió en merc ancias comestibles dulces y caramelos, con los que surtió su negocio y vendió oportunamente. En la actualidad está ofreciendo servicios profesionales como esteticista, donde tambien le ha ido bien, sobre todo porque su negocio bajó en algun momento los ingresos por dificultades familiares y con su profesión pudo reponerse. En la actualidad planea mejorar sus servicios a los clientes y comprará en mayor cantidad nuevamente comestibles y mercancias variadas para surtirlo y lograr un nuevo posicionamiento. Su mensaje a los finaciadores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Agradezco a la Fundación y a Kiva  por los recursos económicos que me han otorgado, para continuar con mi actividad económica, la cual me ha llevado a mejorar mi entorno familiar , personal y económico y espero seguir contando con su apoyo. "
texts.en:
With her previous loan, Mónica was able to improve her sales and invest in merchandise such as food products, sweets, and caramels to restock her business and sell at every opportunity. She currently offers professional services, such as beauty consulting, and has also done very well in these ventures. At one point, business was slow and she encountered financial difficulty, but she was able to recover. Mónica plans to improve the services to her customers and buy a larger quantity of food products and various merchandise to restock her business and gain better positioning.

Her message to Kiva lenders is as follows: "I am grateful to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and Kiva for the financial resources that have been given to me so that I can continue my business and improve my family life, as well as grow personally and financially. I hope to continue receiving your support."

loans.use: to buy food products and other types of merchandise.

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es:
Aracely, vive en casa propia, con su esposo y sus tres hijos,  desde hace 8 años administra una tienda y un molino de nixtamal, atendiendo a los vecinos cercanos, ofrece productos de la canasta básica.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para la tienda, como pastas, aceite, comidas instantáneas, boquitas, galletas, arroz, sal, entre otros productos necesarios para mejorar la disponibilidad y atención.
Su aspiración es que a través de este préstamo pueda tener mayor rentabilidad en las ventas, tambien generar mejores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Aracely lives in her own home with her husband and three children. For the past eight years, she has managed a store and a mill that produces cornmeal. She attends to her neighbors who live nearby and offers them basic household products.

Aracely is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for her store such as pasta, oil, instant foods, snacks, cookies, rice, salt, and other necessary products that will help her increase her available inventory and provide better service. Her aspiration for this loan is to achieve greater profitability from her sales and generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy pasta, oil, instant foods, snacks, cookies, and rice.

loans.name: Vilma Aracely

texts.es:
La señora Vilma tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y dos hijos que ya trabajan. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que desde hace cinco años se dedica la elaboración y venta de minutas. Sus padres siempre han sido personas trabajadoras y negociantes que trabajan con la Fundación Campo. Gracias a la ayuda de sus padres Vilma decidió instalar su propio negocio que es una fuente de ingresos para su familia.

Los materiales para las minutas se preparan artesanalmente, solo compra jarabe y tamarindo en la tienda más cercana, para elaborar las minutas para la venta. El préstamo será para reparar una refrigeradora, en donde la señora prepara el hielo para el negocio de las minutas, la reparación del motor y cambio de piezas cuesta $200 dólares.

Esta inversión será de gran ayuda, por que ella esta identificando que su negocio esta creciendo y solicita el préstamo a la Fundación Campo, para suplir la necesidad de poder elaborar su propio hielo y evitar comprarlo a otra persona. Con la refrigeradora en buen estado se estaría ahorrando alrededor de $50 dólares solo en hielo al mes, por lo que ayudara a Vilma para su negocio y tener más ingresos.

Vilma desea comprar un carretón más, para tener dos y contratar a otra persona para que venda y así poco a poco crecer con su negocio y generar más ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Vilma is 37 years old. She lives with her partner and two children who work. She is a hard working woman who for the last five years has made a living making and selling shaved ice snacks. Her parents have always been hard working business people who work with the Fundación Campo. Thanks to her parents' support she decided to set up her own business as a source of income for her family.

The materials to prepare the ice snacks are made by hand, she only buys syrup and tamarind in a nearby shop to make the ice snacks ready to sell. The loan will be used to repair a refrigerator where she prepares ice for the shaved ice snacks' business. To fix the motor and change parts costs $200 dollars.

This investment will be of great help to her as she notices that her business is growing. She requests this loan from Fundación Campo to be able to make her own ice and avoid having to buy it from other people. With the refrigerator in good condition she will be saving around $50 dollars per month just on ice, which will help Vilma's business have more profits.

Vilma wants to buy another cart in order to have two and hire another person to sell. This way she will extend her business and generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to repair a refrigerator where she prepares ice for the shaved ice snacks business. To fix the motor and change parts costs $200 dollars.

loans.name: Rina

texts.es:
la socia pertenece al banco comunal “Qorichaska del Cusco” este banco se encuentra  ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de elaboracion de manualidades ella elkabora diversos productos como muñecas ,carteras cartucheras entre otros,la socia a la vez vende productos de belleza como cremas,perfumes,colonias entre otros,la socia es una persona bien responsable con muchas ganas de seguir adelnate siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia vende sus productos a sus amistades y familiares ,la socia desea pode continuar elaborando sus prodcutos.

En esta oportunidad Rina requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales para su negocio de manualidades como tela de diferentes colores,tijeras e hilos.  
 
Rina agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Qorichaska del Cusco" communal bank which is in the district, province and department of Cusco.

She alternates her daily activities with her craft business, making products such as dolls, bags, and pencil cases, among other things.  The member also sells beauty products like creams, perfumes, and colognes.  She is a very responsible person and determined to get ahead for her family.  Her customers are her friends and relatives, and she wishes to continue making crafts.

This time Rina is requesting a loan to buy materials for her craft business, like different colored fabric, scissors and thread.

Rina is grateful for the loan and is committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy craft materials such as different colored fabric, scissors and thread.

loans.name: Luís Ángel

texts.es:
El señor Luís tiene 33 años de edad, es soltero. Desde los 10 años de edad, él aprendió el oficio de la ganadería, empezó trabajando como jornalero y al mismo tiempo estudiaba en la escuela.  

Todos los días a las 6:00 a.m. ordeña sus seis vacas, antes ordeña cinco vacas de su vecino a las 4:00 a.m. los insumos como medicinas y otras cosas las compra en una ciudad del oriente del país. El alimento para el ganado lo elabora él, con ayuda de una mezcladora.

Luís solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para elaborar el concentrado para los animales, ya que necesitan moler el sacate para luego mezclarlo. De esta manera, satisfacera la necesidad de sus animales, ya que no pueden esperar por que sino se alimentan no producen y no pudiera vender la leche. Con esto pretende por lo menos mantener la producción de las vacas y mantener la venta de la leche que es la principal fuente de ingreso para su familia.

Luís comenta, que tiene planeado crecer como productor, ya que tiene terneros en crecimiento, que con el tiempo le darán leche. Esto mejorara su condición de vida ya que más producción genera más venta.
texts.en:
Luís is 33 years old and is single. Since he was ten he has learnt the profession of caring for livestock. He started work as a day labourer and at the same time studied at school.

Every day at 6:00am he milk his six cows. Before that he milks his neighbour's five cows at 4:00am. He buys supplies such as medicine and other items in a city to the east of the country. He makes the animal feed up himself, with the help of a mixer.

Luís is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to make up animal feed, as he needs to grind the fodder before later mixing it. In this way he satisfies the needs of his animals. He cannot wait because if they don't eat they don't produce milk for him to sell. With this loan he aims to continue the cows' milk production and the selling of milk which is the main source of income for his family.

Luís comments that he plans to grow as a producer as he already has calves growing, who in time will give him milk. This will improve his living conditions as higher milk production means more sales.

loans.use: to make animal feed, as he needs to grind the fodder before later mixing it.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy wood and tools for his work.

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora Ana tiene 44 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos. Desde hace dos años se dedica al negocio de venta de cuajada preparada con chile, fue su mamá quien le enseño. La cuajada la obtiene de procesar la leche que le dan sus dos vacas. La venta la realiza en su casa y de manera ambulante en el lugar donde vive.

Ella es muy reconocida en la zona, ya que tiene mucha demanda por que su cuajada es de buena calidad. El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar una vaca lechera para producir más leche y por consiguiente obtener más cuajada para satisfacer la demanda, obteniendo mayores ingresos y una seguridad económica en su hogar. Ana le gustaría realizar todo el proceso a la leche hasta elaborar el queso, y esta segura que poco a poco lo lograra.
texts.en:
Ana, 44, is married and lives with her husband and two children.  For two years she has been selling pepper curd which her mother taught her how to make.  The curd comes from processing milk fro her two cows.  She sells from home and also works as a street vendor where she lives.

She is very well known in her area and has many orders for her top quality curd.  The loan she is requesting is to buy a dairy cow to produce more milk so she can increase curd production.  This will increase her income and give her household economic stability.  Ana enjoys the entire process of turning milk into cheese, which she is sure she will be able to do little by little.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow to produce more milk.

loans.name: Maria Colomba

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, la vivienda es propia, tiene tres años en el negocio y este surgió por la necesidad de aportar un ingreso más para el hogar, además de apoyar a su esposo.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de 5 quintales de maíz, para tener disponibilidad para realizar las tortillas, además de aumentar la producción.
Su objetivo con el préstamo, es tener los recursos necesarios para que su negocio crezca, aspirando a futuro poder montar una tienda de productos domestico.
texts.en:
María sells tortillas. She lives in her own home with her husband and three children. María started this business three years ago out of necessity so that she could generate more household income. As a result, she was able to help her husband.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy five "quintales" (1 quintal = 46 kg) of corn so that she will have available supplies for making tortillas. In addition, she will be able to increase production. Her goal for this loan is to have the necessary resources for growing her business. In the future, she aspires to open a store where she can sell household products.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of seafood such as fresh fish, shellfish, and shrimp.

loans.name: Geidy Judith

texts.es:
La señora Geidy tiene 37 años de edad, es divorciada y tiene tres hijos.  Ella se dedicaba a la panadería, fue su mamá quien le enseño, quien era madre soltera al igual que Geidy. Debido a su divorcio ella se dedico a la panadería y con ese oficio poco a poco ha ido sacando a su familia adelante.

Desde hace tres años, ella posee un chalet ya que la panadería no le estaba funcionando, por que los ingredientes subieron de precio y no obtenía muchas ganancias.  Ella viaja desde su cantón hasta una ciudad del oriente del país, para comprar aceite, arroz, frijoles, ente otros productos más en una comercial, las frutas y las verduras las compra en el mercado.

La señora Geidy solicita el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de azúcar, arroz, frijoles, jabón, entre otros más para ampliar su venta.  De esta manera ella podrá tener el dinero suficiente para brindarle el estudio a sus hijos, ya que ella es padre y madre al mismo tiempo para sus hijos y lo que más anhela es que sus hijos se preparen académicamente para que en un futuro tengan una vida mejor, ya que ellos son lo mejor que Díos le ha regalo en la vida.
texts.en:
Geidy, 37, is divorced and has three children.  She used to be in the bakery business and learned the trade from her mother, who was a single mother like Geidy.  She went into the bakery business because of the divorce and little by little was able to provide for her family.

But for three years now she has been running a store because the bakery was not profitable due to the high cost of ingredients.  She travels from her canton to a city in the eastern part of the country to buy oil, rice, beans and other products at a shopping center, and buys fruits and vegetables at the market.

Geidy is requesting a loan to buy sugar, rice, beans, soap and other products to increase sales.  This will allow her to earn the money she needs to give her children a good education, since she is both father and mother and wants a better future for them, as they are her greatest blessing in life.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, beans, soap and other items to increase sales.

loans.name: José María

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 64 años de edad, es casado, tiene cuatro hijos, pero no viven con él. Es una persona trabajadora que se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura, este oficio lo aprendió gracias a su padre, pues fue él quien le enseño y don José lo ha ejercido a lo largo de su vida y ha sido su medio de subsistencia para su familia.

Pero en estos tiempos las ganancias que deja este rubro son muy pocas, por eso él a optado por instalar una tienda en su casa que le genera un ingreso extra, para vivir un poco más.

Don José compra los insumos en la ciudad más cercana que esta a unos cuatro kilómetros de su casa. El trasporte para su casa es muy escaso y él tiene que contratar otro medio de transporte para trasladar la mercadería hasta su casa y por ese motivo el gasto se le incrementa.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar granos básicos para su tienda, ya que él quiere obtener más ganancias y productos para vender. Al tener más mercadería él venderá más y sus ingresos serán mayores para poder subsistir.

En un futuro don José desea tener una tienda más rentable y dedicarse menos a la agricultura, ya que por su avanzada edad sus fuerzas para ejercer esta actividad  no son muy buenas, aunque en su corazón el siente que puede continuar ejerciéndolo y con la tienda no tiene que hacer fuerzas.
texts.en:
José, 64, is married and has four children who do not live with him.  He is a hard worker and always has been dedicated to agriculture, a trade he learned from his father.  José has earned an income in farming all his life and this has been the source of income for his family.

But nowadays it is not a profitable trade so he decided to open a store in his house to generate extra income for a better lifestyle.

José buys goods at the nearest city which is about four kilometers from his house.  Transportation to his house is scarce so he must hire someone to transport the merchandise, which increases costs.

The loan he is requesting is to buy basic grains for his store, since he wants to increase his earnings and buy more products to sell.  By having more stock he will be able to increase his income.

In the future José wants to have a more profitable store and depend less on farming because of his age and the fact that he is no longer strong enough for that type of work.  But in his heart he feels he can continue working and the store does not require much effort.

loans.use: To buy basic grains for his store.

loans.name: Yanci Carolina

texts.es:
Yanci, vive con su esposo y dos hijos,  ella se dedica a la venta de frutas, este surgió por la necesidad de tener un ingreso para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, tiene ya tres años de estar administrándolo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de una mesa para mostrar las frutas y una canasta para mantenerlas en ella, también comprara papayas, manzanas, bananos, este préstamo le ayudara para fortalecer el negocio y mejorar la atención a los clientes.
La aspiración de Yanci es tener mayor estabilidad con el negocio y sus ventas, además de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Yanci is a fruit seller, she lives with her husband and 2 children. She began this type of work 3 years ago as she needed to earn an income to help her husband with the household expenses. 
Today, she is applying for a loan to buy a table on which to display her fruit and a basket to keep them in. She also intends to buy papayas, apples and bananas. This loan will help her to further her business and improve the service that she provides to her customers.
Yanci's motivation is to stabilize her business and her sales level as well as improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy a table, a basket, papayas, apples and bananas.

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
José, vive con sus padres, tienen casa propia tiene un hijo, él se dedica a la agricultura, sembrando maíz y frijol, tiene ya 10 años de estar en este oficio, lo realiza para tener los granos básicos para el consumo del hogar y para la venta.
El solicita un préstamo para pagar el alquiler de terreno, donde se dispone a sembrar, este préstamo le ayudara para tener seguro el sitio y poder ir trabajándolo poco a poco e iniciar la siembra.
La aspiración de José es que su trabajo agrícola sea cada vez más provechoso, tener buenas cosechas para generar más ingresos por sus ventas, además esto le esta asegurando la alimentación a su familia, de esta manera ir mejorando la calidad de vida de la familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his parents and his son in their own home. He has worked in agriculture for the last 10 years, growing staple foods such as corn and beans for them to consume at home and to sell. He is applying for a loan to pay the rent on the land that he uses for growing. This loan will help him to secure his site, allowing him to continue working it bit by bit and to start resowing it.
José motivation is to make his farming work increasingly productive, to have good harvests to generate a better income for his family as well as guaranteeing their food supply, and so improving their quality of life.

loans.use: To pay for land rental.

loans.name: Paula De Jesus

texts.es:
Paola, vive con su familia, tiene tres hijos, ella es ama de casa y tambien se dedica a la agricultura, realiza siembras de maíz con ayuda de sus hijos, este trabajo requiere dedicación para poderse realizar, pero Paola es una mujer trabajadora que le agrada realizar este tipo de actividades.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas y pesticidas para iniciar el cultivo del maíz, la compra le ayudara para tener lo necesario y trabajar con mucho entusiasmo con la esperanza de obtener buenas cosechas. 
La aspiración de Paola es que a través del préstamo pueda tener una cultivo exitoso, tambien poderles proveer a sus hijos lo necesario para la superación y desarrollo de ellos.
texts.en:
Paola is a housewife who lives with her family. She also works in agriculture, sowing corn seeds with the help of her 3 sons. This work requires her dedication to succeed but Paola is a hardworking woman who is happy to carry out this type of work.
She is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers, herbicides and pesticides to begin to cultivate corn. This investment will help her acquire what she needs for planting and to work enthusiastically with the hope of achieving a good harvest.
Paola's motivation is to achieve a successful harvest due to this loan, and to also allow her to provide her sons with whatever is needed to help them excel and develop.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, herbicides and pesticides.

loans.name: Filipina

texts.en:
This is Filipina. She is 46 and a resident of Manila, Philippines. She is married to Eduardo, her business partner and mother to their children. She, together with her husband and children, manages her own household while operating her business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Filipina operates a computer rental shop. In the Philippines, very few people have their own computers. Thus there is a need for them, especially for students who need to do research and papers. 

She rents out computers by the hour and offers printing and typing services. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 Philippine pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operating her business, she is requesting a PHP 25,000 loan. She will utilize the loan to buy new computer units, spare parts and accessories. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. 

Filipina hopes to be able to expand soon, just as she dreams to be able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business.

She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and where she can draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

* All CCT community partners and clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional computer parts and supplies for her computer rental shop.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 31 years old and married. She has one daughter who is nine years old.

Nancy has been operating her clothing business in Nakuru town for the last two years. She was introduced to KADET by an existing client and this will be her first loan. She plans to use the loan to buy new clothes to sell.

In the future, Nancy hopes to expand her business and open a boutique.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Eddah

texts.en:
Eddah is a resident of Kitale. She is married with 5 children aged between 10 and 20, all with schooling. She is 43 and has spent half her life farming. Her farm currently produces beans, vegetables, maize and milk for the local market.

Eddah has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry birds and build a poultry housing unit. She says the venture into poultry farming will help boost her income, due to a ready market for poultry. 

She hopes to grow her business and educate her children with the income she earns from farming.

She says the challenge she faces in farming is dealing with rampant diseases which are costly to treat.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds and build a poultry housing unit.

loans.name: Shadrack

texts.en:
Shadrack is 36 years old. He is from Nakuru and married to Melap. They have four children who are all in school.

Shadrack is a farmer and has been in farming for the past 19 years. He has applied for his first loan from KADET to enable him to install electricity in his home for poultry farming.

He hopes to be a dairy farmer and also a large scale farmer in the future.

loans.use: To install electricity in his home for poultry farming.

loans.name: Ibtesam

texts.en:
Ibtesam is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Adnan appears in her Kiva profile photo. He is photographed on his piece of land, next to olive trees.

Ibtesam is a 45-year-old woman. She is the mother of four sons and two daughters. Her husband Adnan is a worker who gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's costs.

For the past 13 years, Ibtesam's husband has also been working in agriculture, raising olive trees and selling their crops. This has been a profitable project.

Ibtesam is requesting a 1,200 USD loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing more olive seedlings. This will maximize the crop, increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase olive seedlings.

loans.name: Ana Maritza

texts.es:
Ana, vive con una hija de 18 años, quien está casada, Ana administra una tienda de productos básicos, tiene tres años de existir este negocio, lo atiende de 7:00am a 9:00pm, surgió por el esmero de tener una ocupación en la vivienda que le permitiera tener entradas de dinero.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos para surtir el negocio como boquitas, galletas, leche, carne, pollo, huevos, aceite, entre otros productos que son necesarios en los hogares de los clientes, este préstamo le dará la oportunidad de mejorar la disponibilidad para atender a la clientela.
Su aspiración es tener un negocio rentable, más solvente, cancelar este préstamo sin dificultad e ir creciendo poco a poco.
texts.en:
Ana is married and lives with her 18 year old daughter. Ana runs a grocery store, a business she has had for three years, and where she works from 7am until 9pm. The business arose from ana's desire to have a business she could run within her home, that would enable her to bring some money in.

She is seeking a loan to buy goods to stock her business, including snacks, cookies, milk, meat, chicken, eggs,and cooking oil, among other everyday goods her customers need in their homes. This loan will give her the opportunity to improve her ability to give her customers what they want. Her aspiration is to have a profitable business, pay off this loan without difficulty, and to go on growing the business little by little.

loans.use: To buy snacks, cookies, milk, meat, chicken, eggs and cooking oil

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 49 years old and married with 4 children. 

He runs a butcher shop to earn a living and has been in the business for 5 years. He has employed one person. He describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a bull for slaughter.

loans.use: To buy a bull for slaughter.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 26 years old. He is married to Peninah and they have one child. 

He operates a retail shop and has been in the business for the past four years.

This is his first loan from KADET. He was introduced to KADET by one of our clients. He will use the loan to purchase a stock of drinks, sweets and cakes for sale.

His dream is to open a retail shop.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of drinks, sweets and cakes for sale.

loans.name: Asuman

texts.en:
Asuman is married and has 2 children. Her son is 5 years old and her daughter is 14 years old. Her daughter is in high school and her son will start elementary school next year.

Asuman has been working as a tailor for 15 years. She was living in a very poor household when she started in this profession. When her daughter was born, conditions were very difficult and she had financial problems. She wanted to have a shop but her husband did not agree with it. So she turned her house into a tailoring shop and worked from home. 

She sews crib liners, linens and other things for infants. On top of this, she also has some housekeeping jobs. 

Asuman has been a Maya client for 5 years and this will be her first loan through Kiva. With this loan, she will buy fabric for linens and baby materials. Previously, she was using an agent to sell her products, but with this loan she wants to sell directly to the buyers herself.

In the future, she wants to create work for other women. She wants to be able to support her daughter's education so she can have a professional career. Asuman is a woman who fights and hangs on to life.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff.

Asuman, evli ve 2 çocuğu var.  En küçüğü 5,en büyüğü 14 yaşında.kızı lisye gidiyor,oğlu seneye okula başlayacak.  Asuman Hanım, 15 yıldır terzilik yapıyor.Yaşamını döküntü bir evde sürdürürken işe başladı.  Kızı doğduğu zaman yaşam koşulları onun için çok zordu.  Para sıkıntısı çekerken,emanet makine ile dikiş dikmeye başladı.  Dükkan açmak istemiş fakat eşi buna razı olmamış.  Evin altını atölye haline getirmiş.  Nevresim takımları ve bebek beşiği için nevresimler dikiyor.  Bunun yanında ev temizliklerine gidiyor.  Maya ile 5 yıldır çalışıyor.  Bu aldığı kredi ile nevresimlik kumaş alacak.  Diktiği nevresimleri aracıya diktiği için,bu krediden sonra aracıları aradan çıkarıp kendisi direk satmak istiyor.  Gelecekte başka kadınlara iş vermek istiyor.  Kızı için gelecekte okutup ,iş sahibi yapmak istiyor.  Asuman ,hayata karşı mücadele eden,yaşama tutunan bir kadın.

loans.use: to buy fabric for linens and baby materials.

loans.name: Fatima Flor Maria

texts.es:
Fátima, vive con su madre y una prima, está soltera, hasta la fecha todos trabajan en su vivienda, ella se dedica a atender una pupuseria, esto lo aprendió donde una tía, hoy tiene su propio negocio en la vivienda, donde atiende a los clientes de zona que muchos de ellos son amigos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, chicharrón, quesillo, aceite, repollo, condimentos, aderezos, todos estos materiales para el negocio, ya que son necesarios para la elaboración de las pupusas, este préstamo le ayudara a cubrir esta inversión y tener todo lo que ocupa a su alcance para poder realizar la venta.
El objetivo de Fátima es, tener una buena experiencia con este préstamo, realizar una buena inversión, ampliar el número de clientes, y aumentar las ganancias para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Fátima lives with her mother and a cousin.  She is single.  All of the members of her household work.  Fátima runs a pupusa restaurant, a business she learned from an aunt.  Her business is located in her home and this is where she serves the customers from her area, many of whom are friends.  She is requesting a loan to buy corn, chicharrón (fried pork rinds), soft cheese, oil, cabbage and seasonings for her business as they are essential to making her pupusas.  This loan will help her to cover the investment and have everything she needs to hand so that she can make her sales.

Fátima's goal is to have a good experience with this loan, to make a good investment, to expand her number of customers and to increase her profits so that she can help her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, chicharrón, soft cheese, oil, cabbage and seasonings

loans.name: John Macharia

texts.en:
John is in farming and has applied for his second loan from KADET to enable him to buy fertilizers, seeds and pesticides for his farm.

He hopes to be a dairy farmer and a large scale farmer in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds and pesticides for his farm.

loans.name: Nurinarda

texts.es: Nurinarda de 66 años de edad se dedica a la producción de artesanías como mochilas, bolsos diariamente y los fines de semanas a la preparación de comidas especiales;  ella tiene un hijo de 22 años que se encuentra estudiando y es el motor que la impulsa en su trabajo, con el fin de generar ingresos y mejorar día a día su bienestar. Su vida diaria transcurre atendiendo niños en un hogar sustituto en su propia casa, apoyado por el Instituto colombiano de Bienestar familiar, organismo que protege la niñez en Colombia y con el cual genera unos ingresos adicionales.  Mientras en las horas de la tarde se dedica a sus labores artesanales con las que también genera otros ingresos y que la aprendió por tradición familiar en su municipio de Origen, San Jacinto y con la que creó su emprendimiento hace un año.  Los fines de semanas Nurinarda en su negocio  prepara y vende empanadas, pan prensado, postres entre otras delicias, por la que también sus vecinos la reconocen. Su meta es lograr posicionarse en sus negocios y requiere permanentemente capital de trabajo, para invertirle por que su clientela crece cada día más. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará hilo para elaborar nuevos diseños de bolsos y una vitrina calentadora que conserve el calor de sus alimentos los fines de semanas . Su inversión será exitosa porque tiene una buena experiencia, la hace sobre pedidos y aumentará sus posibilidades productivas, pues tiene un capital de trabajo adicional con el que contar para ampliar sus posibilidades de ganar mas dinero mediante su trabajo..
texts.en:
Nurinarda is 66 years old and her business is making handicrafts such as backpacks and bags.  She carries out this work every day.  On weekends, she also prepares special food.  She has a 22-year-old son who is studying and it is for him that she is driven to work hard, so that she can make income and improve his well-being.  Nurinarda's daily life consists of caring for children in a 'hogar substituto' (center for vulnerable children) in her home.  This is supported by the Colombian Institute of Family Welfare, an organization that protects children in Colombia.  This makes her some additional income.  In the afternoons, she makes her handicrafts which also earns her income.  She learned this work by family tradition in her home town of San Jacinto and started working in her own business doing this one year ago. 

On weekends, Nurinarda prepares and sells empanadas, 'pan prensado' (a type of sandwich), desserts and other treats.  She is also well known for this by her neighbors.  Nurinarda's goal is to position herself in her businesses.  She permanently needs working capital to invest so that her number of customers will continue to increase every day.   This is why she is taking out a Kiva loan (her first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo).  She will use it to buy thread so that she can make new bag designs, and a heated display case to keep the food that she prepares on weekends warm.  Her investment will be successful because she is very experienced.  She works to order and will increase her production possibilities as she will have additional working capital with which to expand her possibilities of earning more money through her work.

loans.use: to buy thread for making new bag designs and a heated display case that will keep her food warm on weekends

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Las Joyas, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. 
La socia es la Sra. Eufemia ; ella tiene  41 años de edad y es soltera;  La socia  tiene un pequeño stand  de venta de plásticos,  entre otros pequeños productos, la socia también es costurera y en su mismo stand tiene una pequeña máquina de coser y realiza pequeños trabajos de costura. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de plásticos y bolsas para implementar su negocio.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Eufemia belongs to the 'Virgen del Carmen' community bank which is located in Las Joyas district, in Cusco province and department.

Eufemia is 41 years old and single.  She has a small sales stand where she sells plastic products and other small items.  She is also a seamstress and she has a small sewing machine on her stand where she carries out small sewing jobs.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying plastic products and bags to stock her business.

Eufemia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to invest in buying plastic products and bags to stock her business

loans.name: Sonia Basilio

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, Província de mesmo nome, Sul de Moçambique, viuva e mãe de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez a 6ª classe parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua sobrinha que vive com ela.

É negociante a bastante tempo e tem um rendimento de cerca de 10.300.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção da sua casa (ferro, areia, pedra, cimento, barrotes, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 15.000.00mt e 24.325.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Sonia was born in the city of Maputo, in the Province of the same name, south of Mozambique. She is a widow and the mother of 2 children who both attend school. She completed 6th grade but stopped due to her parents' lack of financial means; she lives in her own house with her family and supports a niece who lives with her.

She has been a businesswoman for quite some time and has a monthly income of around 10,300.00 meticals (MZN) which she uses for her household expenses and some of which she saves in her bank account at a commercial bank (BIM).

She has never had loans from other banks and came to know Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her third loan with Hluvuku for the amount of 15,000.00 MZN, with which she intends to purchase materials for the construction of her house (iron, sand, stone, cement, beams and others). Her previous loans were for 15,000.00 MZN and 24,325.00 MZN which she also applied to her dwelling.

Sonia commits to duly paying off her loan and in future intends to complete the construction of her home, for which she intends to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase materials for the construction of her house (iron, sand, stone, cement, beams and others).

loans.name: Elisa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Elisa, vive en casa propia, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 3 años de edad, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos desde hace 6 años, lo inicio con su esposo, con quien actualmente sigue manejándolo, tienen ya experiencia en el cuido y para comercializarlos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de dos cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos, esta compra le ayudara para aumentar la granja y tener lo necesario para que se alimenten y engorden.
La aspiración de Elisa es tener un negocio rentable, que mejore las condiciones económicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Elisa lives in her own home and has two children who are 5 and 3 years old.  Her business is raising pigs and she has doing this for six years.  She started the business together with her husband and the couple continue running it together.  They have experience caring for and selling the animals.  

Elisa is requesting a loan to buy two pigs and concentrated feed with which to feed them.  This purchase will help her to increase the size of her farm and to have available what she needs to feed and fatten her animals.

Elisa's goal is to have a profitable business which will improve her family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy two pigs and concentrated feed

loans.name: Luisa Iveth

texts.es:
Luisa, es vendedora de bolsas, vive con sus padres, está soltera, ella trabaja con su padre, repartiendo bolsas, ya que trabajan por pedidos, tiene clientes bien definidos a quienes le entregan.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de bolsas pláticas de varios tamaños o números, esta compra le ayudara para mantener en el negocio la suficiente cantidad para atender la demanda, ofreciendo siempre calidad y buen servicio, tambien le ayudara para asegurar las ventas.
Ella quiere fortalecer el negocio, obtener mejores ganancias y apoyar a su familia en lo necesario, mejorando las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Luisa's business is selling bags.  She is single and lives with her parents.  She works with her father delivering bags as they work to order.  She has clear customers to whom she delivers.  Luisa is requesting a loan to buy plastic bags in different sizes.  This purchase will help her to have a large enough quantity of bags that she can meet demand and continue offering good-quality products and a good service.  It will also help her to guarantee her sales.

Luisa would like to strengthen her business, make better profits and support her family, improving their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy plastic bags in different sizes

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Las Joyas, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. 
La socia es la Sra. Lucia ; ella tiene  45 años de edad y es conviviente  y tiene 2 hijos ;  La socia  tiene un pequeño negocio de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, golosinas, gaseosas, condimentos al por menor y otros. La socia en esta ocasión y siendo un banco nuevo desea invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para implementar su pequeño negocio.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Lucia is a member of the 'Virgen del Carmen' community bank which is located in Las Joyas district, in Cusco province and department.  

Lucia is 45 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She has a small grocery store business where she sells basic household products such as rice, sugar, milk, noodles, candies, soda, seasonings, etc. retail.  On this occasion, she would like to invest in buying basic household products with which to stock her small business.

Lucia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to invest in buying basic household products to stock her small business

loans.name: Norgen Abel

texts.es:
Norgen, tiene 25 años de edad, vive con sus padres, él trabaja en el ingenio de caña de azúcar, tiene dos años de estar laborando, de esta ocupación logra ayudar a sus padres con gastos del hogar y tambien cubrir sus propias necesidades.
Actualmente tiene la oportunidad de comprarse un vehículo para transportarse a su trabajo, pero no le alcanza sus ahorros por lo que solicita un préstamo para el complemento del valor de carro, esta inversión es de mucha ayuda para Norgen porque estará obteniendo un activo del cual a futuro puede obtener ganancia. Por el momento lo necesitaría para transportarse al trabajo ya que está un poco retirado.
La aspiración de él es que a través del empleo pueda pagar este préstamo para que el vehículo realmente sea de su propiedad, tambien poder mejorar la condiciones de vida de sus padres.
texts.en:
Norgen is 25 years old and lives with his parents.  He has been working in a sugar refinery for two years.  Through his job, he manages to help his parents with their household expenses and also cover his own needs.

Norgen currently has the opportunity to buy a vehicle for driving to work in.  However, he does not have enough savings and so he is requesting a loan to put together with his savings in order to meet the sale price.  This investment will be very helpful to Norgen because he will be obtaining an asset from which, in the future, he will be able to obtain a profit. Right now he needs it to get to work as his workplace is a little out-of-the-way.

Norgen's goal is to use his wages to repay his loan so that the vehicle really belongs to him.  He would also like to be able to improve his parents' living conditions.

loans.use: to put money toward some savings he has in order to buy a vehicle

loans.name: Silsa Isabel

texts.es: Silsa con su credikiva anterior compró hilos, hilazas de algodón, maíz y un par de cerdos , también le alcanzó su credikiva para comprar productos de belleza, pues aprovechó promociones debido a que tenia el dinero en efectivo para hacerlo, así mismo compró  una olla grande, un molino para moler  maíz y está ayudando a su hija para hacer su casa. Ella está muy feliz y planea invertir su nuevo credikiva, para el cual está aplicando, en la compra de una hectárea de maíz, hilo fino para ampliar su negocio de venta de hamacas y bolsos. Ella envía el siguiente mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva donde dice que está muy agradecida por facilitarle el crédito y por confiar en ella como microempresaria y muy contenta por el apoyo de la Fundación.
texts.en: With her previous Kiva loan, Silsa bought cord, cotton thread, corn and a pair of pigs. Her loan also allowed her to buy beauty products; she was able to take advantage of promotions because she had the money in cash to do so. At the same time, she bought a large pot and a grinder to mill corn, and she is helping her daughter build a house. She is very happy and plans to invest the new Kiva loan for which she is applying in buying a hectare of corn, as well as fine cord to expand her business selling hammocks and bags. She sends the following message to the Kiva lenders: she says she is very grateful for the facilitation of her loan and for the confidence placed in her as a microentrepreneur, and she is very happy about the support from the Foundation.

loans.use: to buy a hectare of corn as well as fine cord to expand her business selling hammocks and bags.

loans.name: El Hadji

texts.fr:
El hadji est un menuisier ébéniste qui s’active depuis 8 ans .Il est né en 1966, est marié et père de famille. Son activité consiste à fabriquer des meubles  pour les revendre. Il est un habitué du guichet  car il a eu à bénéficier de deux crédits soldés sans difficulté. Avec le prêt El hadji va acheter du bois et des accessoires : 5 paquets de serrures et 6 paquets de monture.  Il lui arrive de confectionner des meubles et de les exposer  comme il peut avoir des commandes à exécuter pour  des particuliers. Il a acquis une expérience de 8 ans dans ce domaine. Avec le fruit de ses ventes il entretient sa famille.
Dans l’avenir il aimerait agrandir son activité et l’élever à un niveau supérieur.
texts.en:
El hadji has been a carpenter / cabinet maker for 8 years. He was born in 1966, is married and a father. His business consists of making furniture for resale. He is a regular customer of the UIMCEC branch and has already benefited from 2 loans which were settled without difficulty.

El hadji will use this loan to buy wood and accessories; 5 packets of locks and 6 packets of frames. He sometimes makes furniture and displays it, and sometimes gets orders from private customers. He has built up good experience after working for 8 years in this line of work. He uses the revenue from his sales to take care of his family. In the future, he would like to expand his business and take it to a higher level.

loans.use: to buy wood with which to make furniture for resale, and accessories.

loans.name: Iolanda Felismina

texts.pt:
Nasceu no distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, viúva e mãe de 4 filhos dos quais apenas dois frequentam a Escola. Frequenta a 12ª classe, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém.

É secretaria executiva na associação KINDLIMUKA e tem um salário de 3000.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção da sua casa (janelas, ferro, areia, pedra, cimento, barrotes, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 13.200.00mt e 15.000.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Iolanda was born in the district of Boane, Province of Maputo, South of Mozambique, is a widow and the mother of 4 children who attend School. She is currently taking the 12th grade, lives in her own house and doesn't support anyone else.

She is an executive secretary at the KINDLIMUKA Association and has a salary of 3,000.00 meticals (MZN) which she uses for households expenses and some of which she saves in her bank account (BIM).

She has never had loans from other banks and she came to know Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her third loan with Hluvuku for the amount 15,000.00 MZN, which she intends to use to buy materials for the construction of her house (windows, iron, sand, stone, cement, beams and others). Her previous loans were for 13,200.00 MZN and 15,000.00 MZN, which she also used for her dwelling.

She commits to duly paying off the loan and in future intends to complete the construction of her house, for which she intends to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: To buy materials materials for the construction of her house: windows, iron, sand, stone, cement, beams and others.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is 32 years old and a single mother of one child. She sells electricity poles and it has been very profitable. She has operated her business for the last five years. 

She plans to use the loan amount to buy more electricity poles to sell through her business. In the future, Monica hopes to invest more in her business and to own real estate.

loans.use: To buy more electricity poles to sell.

loans.name: Teresa Juliao

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade da Matola, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e mãe 6 filhos dos quais apenas um frequenta a Escola. Fez o nível primário e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É negociante há mais de 16 anos dedica-se a venda de produtos alimentares e tem um rendimento de cerca de 6.000.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária.
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos (óleo, amendoim, feijão, batata, farinha, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 15.000.00mt, e 15.000.00mt,aplicado no negócio. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende construir um murro para a sua casa e pagar os estudos da filha, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Teresa was born in the city of Matola, Province of Maputo, South of Mozambique, is single and the mother of 6 children of which only one attends School. She completed primary school and stopped her education due to her parents' lack of financial means, lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She has been a businesswoman for more than 16 years and dedicates herself to the sale of food products. She has a monthly income of around 6,000.00 meticals (MZN) which she uses for household expenses and some of which she saves in her bank account.

She has never had loans from other banks and she came to know Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her third loan with Hluvuku for the amount 15,000.00 MZN, which she intends to use to buy products (oil, peanuts, beans, potatoes, flour and others) to increase the quantity of her goods. Her previous loans were for 15,000.00  MZN and 15,000.00 MZN which she also used for her business. 

She commits to duly paying off the loan and in future intends to construct a wall for her house and pay for her daughter's studies, for which she intends to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: To buy oil, peanuts, beans, potatoes, flour, and other products for her food stall

loans.name: Armando

texts.pt:
Nasceu no distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 8 filhos dos quais apenas um frequenta a Escola. Fez a 5ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais dois netos que vivem com ele.

É serralheiro na empresa Aguas de Moçambique e tem um salário de 6000.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu quarto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção da sua casa (ferro, areia, pedra, cimento, barrotes, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 10.000.00mt, 12.000.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e mobilar, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Armando was born in the district of Boane, Province of Maputo, South of Mozambique, is married and the father of 8 children, of whom only one attends School. He completed 5th grade and stopped his education due to his parents' lack of financial means. He lives in his own house with his family and supports 2 grandchildren who live with him.

He's a locksmith with the Aguas de Moçambique company and has a salary of 6,000 meticals (MZN) which he applies to household expenses and some of which he saves in his bank account at a commercial bank (BIM).

Armando has never had loans from other banks and he came to know Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is his fourth loan with Hluvuku for the amount of 15,000.00 MZN, with which he intends to purchase construction materials for his house (iron, sand, stone, cement, beams and others). His other loans were for 10,000.00 MZN and 12,000.00 MZN which he also used for his dwelling.

He commits to duly paying off his loan and in future he intends to complete the construction of his house and furnish it, for which he intends to solicit more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: To buy construction materials for his house; sand, iron, bricks, cement and others.

loans.name: Domingo Ramiro

texts.es:
En el municipio de Telica departamento de León, El señor  domingo, labora como operador de bomba en un pozo  de la localidad, dedicándose a esa labor desde hace 31 años, es Casado con 5 hijos los que ya son independientes.
Una de las necesidades que el  señor  Domingo  atraviesa hoy en día, es la afectación de su salud, por los gastos del tratamiento de la misma, por lo que ha tomado la decisión de acudir a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para efectuarse su debido tratamiento, y de esa manera mejorar las condiciones de salud y familiar ya que se realizara exámenes generales, compra de medicamentos, consultas y eco encefalograma para tener un mejor diagnostico y eficacia en el tratamiento mismo.
texts.en:
Domingo works as a pump operator at a well in the Telica municipality, León department.  He has been doing this work for 31 years.  He is married and has five children, who are now independent.

One of the needs that Domingo is presently experiencing is the concern about his health and the expenses of his health treatments.  Therefore, he has made the decision to come to Ceprodel to request a loan to get the proper treatment.  This way he hopes to improve his health and family conditions.

He will get the general exams, buy medications, have consultations, and an echo EEG.  He will do this in order to have a better diagnosis and to effectively treat his condition.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses like exams, medicine, consultations, and an echo EEG.

loans.name: Hülya

texts.en:
Hülya is married and has two children. The younger one is 17 years old and in high school while the older one is a 21-year-old university student. 

Hülya has been doing bridal and evening dress work for 15 years. She began by sewing pieces of fabric in her house when she was married. Taking note of the wedding dress styles worn by the women at the hairdresser who were getting their hair done before weddings, she began sewing wedding dresses at home. 

Later, after attending classes at the Public Education Center, she opened up a store. This year she took on the work of sewing graduation caps and gowns for high schools and universities. With this loan she will buy fabric to make these orders. In the future, she would also like to go into the business of wedding planning and decorating wedding cars. Through her work she wants to make a good investment in her children’s future. Hülya is a forward-looking, forthright woman who makes her dreams a reality and applies what she sees in her life to her work.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff,

Hülya Hanım,evli ve 2 çocuğu var.  En küçüğü 17,en büyüğü 21 yaşında .  Biri lisede diğeri üniversitede okuyor.  Hülya Hanım gelinlik ve abiye işi ile 15 yıldır uğraşıyor.  Evlendiği zaman,evde parça kumaşlarla dikiş yapmaya başlamış.  Kuaför salonuna gelen kadınların gelinlik modellerine bakıp aynısını uygulamaya başlamış.  Evde gelinlik dikmeye başlamış.Sonra Halk Eğitim Merkezi'nden eğitim alarak,dükkan açmış.  Bu yıl lise ve üniversitelerin kep ve cüppe dikme işini almış.  Bu kredi ile de kumaş alıp ,bunları yetiştirmeye çalışacak.  Gelecekte düğün organizasyonu ve gelin arabası süslemesi işine girmek istiyor.  Gelecekte çocuklarına iyi bir yatırım yapmak istiyor.  Hülya Hanım,ileriye bakan ,gören ve gördüğünü uygulayan,hayallerini hayata geçiren,mücadeleci bir kadın.
